conbody.p: Contracting officers shall consult the Disaster Response Registry via https://www.sam.gov , Search Records, Advanced Search, Disaster Response Registry Search when contracting for debris removal, distribution of supplies, reconstruction, and other disaster or emergency relief activities inside the United States and outlying areas. (See 26.205 ).
